facts.title: The 90-Second Rule
facts.text: Did you know? Cravings are like ocean waves. They build up, crash, and fade away in about 90 seconds!

facts.title: Brain Trails
facts.text: Every time you choose an activity instead of giving in to a craving, your brain builds a new trail. The more you practice, the stronger the trail gets!

facts.title: Dopamine Detective
facts.text: Your brain has a helper called dopamine. Moving your body gives your brain the good kind that lasts longer!

facts.title: Puzzle Power
facts.text: Here's a cool trick: your brain can't crave AND solve a puzzle at the same time! That's why brain games work!

facts.title: Calm Body, Calm Mind
facts.text: When you take deep breaths, you tell your brain 'everything is okay!' It's like a secret calm-down button!

facts.title: Everyone Gets Cravings
facts.text: Guess what? Everyone gets cravings - kids and grown-ups! It's totally normal. You're learning to ride the wave!

facts.title: Super Brain
facts.text: Your brain is like a muscle. The more you practice crushing cravings, the easier it gets. That's called neuroplasticity!

facts.title: Movement Magic
facts.text: When you move your body, your brain releases feel-good chemicals. It's like giving your brain a happy hug!
